description: A POP/IMAP/SMTP/Caldav/Carddav/LDAP exchange gateway allowing users to use any mail/calendar client with an Exchange server, even from the internet or behind a firewall through Outlook Web Access (OWA).
notes: To register the DavMail service, run either of the following:
To register the DavMail service, run:
pre_install: Set-Content "$dir\remove-davmail-service.ps1" "Stop-Service -Name 'DavMail' -Force -Verbose; Remove-Service -Name 'DavMail' -Verbose; Write-Output 'DavMail service was unregistered!'" -Encoding 'utf8'
pre_uninstall: Stop-Service -Name 'DavMail' -Force -Verbose; Remove-Service -Name 'DavMail' -Verbose; Write-Output 'DavMail service was unregistered!'
